scenario.name: registration
scenario.send: REGISTER sip:[$domain] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];rport;branch=[branch] Max-Forwards: 70 From: "[$username]" <sip:[$username]@[$domain]>;tag=[call_number] To: "[$username]" <sip:[$username]@[$domain]> Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: 7 REGISTER Contact: <sip:sipp@[local_ip]:[local_port]> Expires: [$expires] Content-Length: 0 User-Agent: SIPp

REGISTER sip:[$domain] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];rport;branch=[branch] Max-Forwards: 70 From: "[$username]" <sip:[$username]@[$domain]>;tag=[call_number] To: "[$username]" <sip:[$username]@[$domain]> Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: 8 REGISTER Contact: <sip:sipp@[local_ip]:[local_port]> Expires: [$expires] Content-Length: 0 User-Agent: SIPp [authentication]
